meta.title: User Guide for Coin24.com.ua Service
meta.description: In this section, you will find helpful information about the operation of the Coin24.com.ua exchange service.

1_1.title: Logging in with Google Account and Two-Factor Authentication;

list.p1: To do this, go to the <NavLink to="/login" className="default-link">login</NavLink> page;
list.p2: Then click on the Google icon;
list.p3: Next, enter the six-digit two-factor authentication code;
list.p4: After clicking the "Confirm" button, you will successfully log into your personal account.

2_1.title: Creating an Article;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p4: In the "Title" field, enter the title of the article;
list.p5: In the "Description" field, describe the article;
list.p6: In the "Content" field, add information or photos for the article;

2_1.p1: If necessary, you can add a photo for this article and fill in the fields: "Image Alt Tag", "Select Cryptocurrency", "Meta Title", "Meta Description", "Author";
2_1.p2: Attention! You can change the URL of the article if the news is not published.

2_2.title: Editing an Article;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p5: You can then change the necessary information in the article;

2_2.p1: Attention! You can change the URL of the article if the news is not published.

2_3.title: Publishing an Article;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p4: Click the checkbox (button) in the "Publication" column;

2_3.p1: After publishing the article, it will appear in public access on <NavLink to="/news" className="default-link">this page</NavLink>.

2_4.title: Deleting an Article;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;

2_4.p1: After these actions, the article will be deleted.

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p4: In the "Select Country" select, choose the country you want to add;
list.p5: Then in the "Select City" select, choose the city you want to add;
list.p6: In the "Description" field, add a description for the city;
list.p7: In the "Meta Description" field, add a meta description for the city;
list.p8: In the "URL" field, enter the link at which this article will be displayed;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p5: You can then change the necessary information in the city;
list.p6: After making the changes, click the "Save" button.

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p4: Click the checkbox (button) in the "Publication" column;
list.p6: After publishing the city, it will appear in public access on <NavLink to="/cities" className="default-link">this page</NavLink>.

3_4.title: Deleting a City;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;

3_4.p1: After these actions, the city will be deleted.

list.p1: Go to the page to which you want to attach a traffic link;
list.p2: Copy the URL (link) of the page;
list.p3: Go to the main page of the Coin24 website (click on the logo);
list.p4: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p7: In the "Enter Website Name" field, enter the name of the traffic or resource on which it will be placed;
list.p8: In the "Enter Link" field, paste the URL you copied earlier, which will be used to track the traffic;

4_2.title: Deleting a Traffic Link;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p3: Select the traffic link you want to delete;

4_2.p1: Attention! You cannot delete a traffic link if a client has registered using that link.

5_1.title: How to change your name and surname?
5_1.p1: You can change this information in your personal account.
5_1.p2: To change your name or surname:

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p2: Go to the <NavLink to="/panel/account" className="default-link">personal account settings</NavLink> (gear icon);
list.p3: In the "Name" field, change your name to the desired one;
list.p4: In the "Surname" field, change your surname to the desired one;

5_2.title: How to subscribe or unsubscribe from newsletters?
5_2.p1: Coin24 periodically sends emails to its clients. If you do not wish to receive emails from this service, you can unsubscribe from the newsletter:

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p2: Go to the <NavLink to="/panel/account" className="default-link">personal account settings</NavLink> (gear icon);
list.p4: Click the checkbox "Newsletter". The newsletter includes messages about promotions and notifications about changes in the service;
list.p5: Click the checkbox "Service Messages". Service messages are technical messages about the status of your application or information about events related to your account.

5_2.p2: Similarly, you can subscribe to newsletters from the Coin24.com.ua service.

5_3.title: How to add a photo (avatar)?
5_3.p1: To add a photo (avatar) to your profile, follow these steps:

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" menu item;
list.p2: Go to the <NavLink to="/panel/account" className="default-link">personal account settings</NavLink> (gear icon);
list.p4: Select the photo you want to set;

5_3.p2: Attention! Your photo should not exceed 5 Mb.

6_1.title: To send a message to the administration of the exchange service, follow these steps:

list.p2: In the "Name" field, enter your name;
list.p3: In the "Surname" field, enter your surname;
list.p4: In the "E-mail" field, enter your email address;
list.p5: In the "Your Message" field, write your message to the website administration;
list.p6: Then select the direction "Non-cash payment" or "Cash payment" depending on the direction of exchange your inquiry relates to;
list.p7: If you have chosen "Cash payment", select the country and city of exchange you are interested in;

6_1.p1: If you are logged into your account, the "Name", "Surname", and "E-mail" fields will be automatically filled in;
6_1.p2: After sending the message, wait for a response to the email address you provided.
